title: Stocks shiver as new U.S.-China tariffs add to global gloom
text: Global stock prices fell on Monday after the United States and China imposed new tariffs on each other's goods, reinforcing investors' worries over slowing global growth.

title: Trump says trade talks still planned for Sept. after China tariffs go into effect
text: “We are talking to China, the meetings in September, that hasn’t changed,” Trump told reporters Sunday on the White House South Lawn after returning from Camp David.

title: Trump's 15% tariffs on $112 billion in Chinese goods take effect
text: The Trump administration's latest round of tariffs on Chinese imports took effect Sunday, raising prices Americans pay for clothes, shoes, sporting goods and other consumer goods ahead of the holiday shopping season.

title: US and China begin imposing new tariffs as trade war escalates
text: Chinese exports worth $125bn will face new taxes from 1 September, while China places levy on oil as agreement becomes more distant

title: China calls US 'school bully' as trade war escalates
text: China has told the US to stop acting like a "school bully" as the two countries imposed further tariffs on each other's goods on Sunday.

title: China takes cautious steps with new tariffs, leaving most to December
text: The proportion of Chinese tariffs on U.S. goods that took effect on Sunday only account for one third of more than 5,000 product lines listed.

title: Oil falls amid new round of tariffs in US-China trade war
text: Oil prices fell on Monday after new tariffs imposed by the United States and China came into force, raising concerns about a further hit to global growth and demand for crude.

title: Asia stocks set to trade lower as new US-China trade tariffs go into effect
text: Stocks in Asia were set to decline at the open on Monday as the latest round of U.S. and China tariffs kicked into effect over the weekend.

title: A 'fear bubble' is creating a huge buying opportunity, long-time market bull Jim Paulsen says
text: Leuthold Group's Jim Paulsen sees a phenomenon that could send stocks off to the races.

title: Trump's 15 percent tariff on Chinese goods kicks in
text: And China retaliates with its own tariffs on US goods, as the trade war ratchets up.

title: Howard Marks: Nothing’s Riskier Than a Widespread Belief That There’s No Risk
text: Why do financial meltdowns happen when they are least expected? Why do the bad times inevitable eventually turn bad?

title: Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, And LTC Had A Brutal Week -- What's Next?
text: Cryptocurrency traders should follow closely the US-China trade war.

title: China, U.S. kick off new round of tariffs on each other's goods
text: China and the United States began imposing additional tariffs on each other's goods on Sunday, the latest escalation in a bruising trade war, despite signs that talks would resume some time this month.

title: China starts to impose additional tariffs on some U.S. goods
text: China on Sunday started to impose additional tariffs on some of the U.S. goods on a $75-billion target list, with effect from 0401 GMT.
